body.name: Wifi Projector with Bluetooth, Native 1080P Full HD Projector with Speaker, 9500 Lumens Outdoor Portable Movie Mini Projector Compatible with Laptop, Smartphone, TV Stick, Xbox, Roku
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 4 hrs 40 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 12 hrs 40 mins
features: ★【Full HD 1080P Resolution】The projector has been upgraded to a brightness of 250 ANSI Over , with over 9500L brightness and an ultra-high contrast ratio of 12000:1. It also features focus and ±15° keystone correction, and adopts an innovative high-refraction 6-layer lens design, providing an immersive visual experience for gaming or watching movies with vibrant, dynamic colors and real HD images.

★【200" Giant Size】The projector can project images ranging from 36" to 200" for home theater and outdoor movies, and comes with built-in 10W stereo speakers that feature original audio fidelity. The projector's Bluetooth feature can connect to wireless speakers or a soundbar to present more detailed sound effects.

★【Advanced Enclosed System】The movie projector adopts the latest technology to extend the life of the lamp. The projector's LCD diffuse reflection technology creates soft light, and the fully enclosed display design eliminates dust pollution for a superior, continuous audio-visual experience.

★【Multiple Device Connections】The projector is equipped with multiple ports, including HDMI, USB, AV, VGA, and TF, making it easy to connect to various media devices such as TV sticks, XBOX, USB flash drives, PCs, and DVD players.

★【Technical Support & Extra Carrying Bag】The projector supports 3-month free returns and 3-year technical customer service. Additionally, an exquisite carrying bag is included for free, making the projector easy to pack for travel. It is the best gift choice for birthdays, Valentine's Day, Christmas, or other special occasions for friends or family members.
body.description: Native 1080P Full HD Projector - Enjoy Your Lovely Home Movie TheaterThis portable home&outdoor movie projector uses an advanced LED light source, high-quality materials, and exquisite manufacturing technology.1920*1080 native resolution12000:1 high contrast ratio9500 Lumens-85% brightness improvedDual 5W Hi-Fi surround stereo speakerBig screen max 200“ displayFlexible multi-devices connectivity10000 Hours LifetimeEye protection&Dust removal cover design&Diffuse reflection technologyEasy to install & Operate & Carry aroundBluetooth mini projector is equipped with 2*HDMI port, 1*USB port, 1*AV port, 1*VGA port, 1* 3.5mm Audio port，1* Micro SD portEnjoy Outdoor Movie Nights AnywhereThis video projector is a must for everyday entertainment. Our projectors work well outside, and they’re perfect for using on a outdoor movie screen. You can enjoy wonderful game performances and bring you a warm and happy parent-child time.Max 200 inch big screenThe projection screen size varies from 36'' to 200''. The projection distance between 1m and 7m. By moving the projector farther to the screen, the screen will become larger. For the best viewing experience, we suggest that the projector placed on the center of the screen ,and the recommended size:100inch screen size (ideal distance is 9.8-10.66ft ).Focus and ±15°keystone correctionWhen the projector is moving with the distance changes, the picture will be blur, focusing on a projector can be accomplished by twisting its focus wheel and slide the keystone key for the vertical correction of ±15° until the projected image comes into focus and appears sharp.NOTE:1. It's not recommended for large conference, teaching activity, or commercial usage.2. It's highly recommended to use in a dark environment for the best picture performance.
